headline: VARIAN DRY SCROLL PUMP 8.8 CFM
description: Rebuilt by Varian Dry Scroll Pump    Varian TRISCROLL 300 Part number PTS03001UNIV or EXPPTS03001   Pump to be rebuilt once sold
keywords: mechanical vacuum pump backing pump roughing pump two stage pump
categories.lvl2: Vacuum Processing Equipment  >  Vacuum Pumps > Rotary Vane Pumps
specstable:
Manufacturer Varian
Model TRISCROLL 300
Dry Pump YES
Pumping Speed 8.8 CFM (248.7 l/m)
Ultimate Pressure 1.20E-2(En) torr (1.60E-2 mbar)
Inlet Flange KF 25.0 mm (0.984 in)
Exhaust Flange KF 16.0 mm (0.630 in)
Duty--Service Normal
Gas Ballast Yes
Motor Horsepower 3/4 HP
Other Information

Exhaust Connection: .25" Female NPT
Operating Voltages 100-115/200-230 VAC
Rotational Speed: 50 Hz: 1425 rpm
60 Hz: 1725 rpm

Power Requirements 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
CE Marked YES
Exterior Dimensions
Width 10.000 in (25.4 cm)
